resources.string: On February 16, 2020, the urban emotional drama Everyone Wants to meet you was launched on IQiyi. Zhang Ruonan plays the sunny girl Luo Xi in the play, which can make Zhang Huan, a career madman, relieve his headache symptoms.[13] On April 25, starring in the romantic light comedy Love Is All was launched on Youku. Tan Lingyin, played by Zhang Ruonan in the play, is a playful and lovely story-book writer and county government official.[14] On October 1, in Hunan Satellite TV\'s 2020 National Day Gift Â· Hunan Satellite TV Blue Moon Mid-Autumn Festival Night, the realistic short film College Entrance Examination 2020 in which he participated was broadcast, in which he played the role of a senior high school student struggling for his dream.[15] On December 4, the urban fantasy movie The End of Endless Love was released nationwide. On April 28, 2023, the youth love movie All These Years participated in will be released.[30] On the same day, the starring urban romantic comedy You Have Today was launched.[31] On May 20, the starring romantic comedy movie Too Beautiful to Lie was released.[32][33][34] On June 2, the TV series A Date with the Future starring William Chan was broadcast on Jiangsu Satellite TV
